fn.p: Citation Garcia-Lemos AM, Hennessy RC, Nielsen TK, Hansen LH, Nicolaisen MH. 2021. Complete genome sequence of Paenibacillus sp. strain 37, a plant growth-promoting bacterium isolated from the rhizosphere of Abies nordmanniana (Nordmann fir). Microbiol Resour Announc 10:e01139-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/MRA.01139-19.
